 - apache 2.0.49

Server Error, when I restart it this not respond at port 8080.
Any idea??? HELP please

text:
Check your client/browser:

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection
abort: socket write error

This is not a Tomcat bug. Your socket is closed before the request/response is
completed.

Thanks

-- Jeanfrancois
